response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value and the impact it could have on your operations, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 11000}
